resources.string: I\'ll help you connect effortlessly to all your home \n devices, enabling you to group then smartly and \n control them from anywhere
You can create smart routines to automate your \n devices based on your habits and save on both \n time and energy
I\'ll always keep an eye out on your home, \n notifying you of any energy leaks, security \n breaches and even potential threats
I\'m a smart learner & as I\'ll get to know you better, I\'ll constantly recmmend you tips to make your experiance seamless & beneficial
